name: Kamala Virus
description:
Description:
Infect them all before the group gets entirely vaccinated. But beware that a doctor lurks in the shadows and will chase you if he discovers you!

Controls:

Use WASD or arrow keys to control the black capsule. Get others within your reach to infect them. You win if you infect a percentage of population higher than the herd immunity percentage set at the beginning (minimum is 50%, maximum is 90%). There is a doctor disguised as a normal individual. If you get near him, he starts to chase you, and you are able to identify him. If he reaches you, you lose the game.

In future updates, these following features may be added:

  • Sound Effects
  • Different Game Modes
  • Achievements
  • Bug Fixing
